name: Western Outlaw
description:
Web Build for CSU Chico's CAGD 370 Spring 2020 due to zip/download files not working properly. The scaling is a bit off, hence the menu not fully fitting and the boss hp bar blocking the player stats. Luckily our game play features do seem to work. Please understand this is a last minute build.

Game Summary: Ride a horse and save your cowboy as you try to get home before sunset. Defeat the notorious bandits and avoid the desert hazards as you ride off into the sunset.
